tasks.task: Explain the operation and features of the solar water pump, the React pump.
subtasks: Describe the pumping capacity of the React pump.
Mention the maximum height the pump can lift water.
Discuss the impact of weather conditions on pump performance.
Recommend the number of solar panels required for optimal performance.
Advise on alternative configurations for better water output.
Encourage viewers to contact for discussions about farm water needs.
Inquire about the specific pumping requirements of the viewer's farm.
Determine the appropriate pump configuration based on needs.
